title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
description: More famous than ever after hitting the silver screen, the ever-dramatic Lola Cep is still in the spotlight â€” vying with Born-to-Win, Born-to-Run-Everything Carla Santini to snag the lead in the high school play. Can Lola survive Carla's attempts at retaliation? Once the curtain goes up, which drama queen will take center stage?
author: Dyan Sheldon
